function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"No strict enforcement of COVID-19 mitigation measures in the Netherlands.","Impact":"Higher risk of non-compliance and greater spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement stricter enforcement measures and penalties for non-compliance.","Technologies":"Surveillance technology for monitoring public spaces.","People":"General population in the Netherlands.","Owner":"Government and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Inability to comply with measures due to lack of resources or knowledge.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of non-compliance and higher risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Education and support for those with limited resources, and clearer communication of the measures.","Technologies":"Online communication platforms and educational tools.","People":"Those with limited resources or knowledge.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and community organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of clarity about the COVID-19 measures.","Impact":"Decreased compliance and potential confusion among the public.","Mitigation":"Improved communication and dissemination of clear, understandable guidelines and instructions.","Technologies":"Online communication platforms and public messaging systems.","People":"General population.","Owner":"Government and public health authorities."}]}
